project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in correct chronological order in the chat window
Unread messages are clearly indicated until viewed by the user
dependencies: WebSocket or similar real-time communication protocol
non_functional: System should support at least 10,000 concurrent users

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Video call connection established within 5 seconds of initiation
Video and audio streams remain synchronized with latency under 300ms
Users can end the call at any time and return to the chat interface
non_functional: Support HD video quality (720p) under optimal network conditions
Maintain call uptime of 99% during active sessions

notes: Assumed requirement includes both one-to-one messaging and video calling; group video calls not specified. Security, encryption, and cross-platform support are not detailed but may be needed.
